author: fern
description:
Start learning on Brilliant for free today: https://brilliant.org/fern. Our viewers get 20% off an annual premium subscription. It’s a great way to support our channel while building new skills (ad).

This video is largely based on Blaine Harden’s book “Escape from Camp 14”, about former prisoner Shin Dong-Hyuk.
In 2015, Shin retracted parts of his story. Harden details the changes on his website: https://blaineharden.com/escape-from-camp-14-reviews/

Kim Yong’s escape story: https://books.google.de/books/about/Long_Road_Home.html?id=CDncjwEACAAJ&redir_esc=y

This is the story of North Korea’s deadliest prison camp - Camp 14

Sources: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ugrl8ddk9mkXtjtSPUcrf5oPJbKKDmcWJLqZMl1X6MI/edit?usp=sharing 

Music list:

Artlist

Colten Tyler Williams - Gathering
Quinten Coblentz - Monster Within
Colten Tyler Williams - Gathering
Rotem Moav - Blood on the Snow
Adam Dib - It Comes at Night
Shahead Mostafafar - Fallen
Gilad Benamr
title: Camp 14: The Most Horrible Place in North Korea
